body:
Hey guys.  I am in the middle of building a server and I wanted to know, how do you use sings to activate commands?  For example:

I want this sign to allow you to save what ever is in your inventory so when you leave, you can just click on the sign when you return.  I also want to know how to use signs to activate other commands.  Thanks.

-Tarheelkiwi
body_tagged:
Hey guys.  I am in the middle of building a server and I wanted to know, how do you use sings to activate commands?  For example:

I want this sign to allow you to save what ever is in your inventory so when you leave, you can just click on the sign when you return.  I also want to know how to use signs to activate other commands.  Thanks.

-Tarheelkiwi
title: Sign Commands

replies.body:
http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/empirecommandsigns/

this should work, but you will need a plugin with the ability to save a player's inventory as well. (Not sure if essentials has that.)
replies.body_tagged:
http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/empirecommandsigns/

this should work, but you will need a plugin with the ability to save a player's inventory as well. (Not sure if essentials has that.)

replies.body: So would I have to install another plug in so the players can save their inventory?
replies.body_tagged: So would I have to install another plug in so the players can save their inventory?

replies.body:
Nonono, in the config folder of Essentials search Sings, it says something like: 'delete # to allow this command'
then below that you have a list, delete the # left to the command.
sorry if I don't show you it with images, I'm on my phone.

Add me on skype and I'll show you it more explicit, my skype is in my avicus profile.
